author: IGN
description: In this video, we’ll show you how you can unlock the Happy Place trophy or achievement, which requires you to reach the highest point on the map, in Assassin’s Creed Shadows.
title: AC Shadows: How to Reach the Highest Point on the Map (Happy Place Trophy Guide)

author: IGN
description:
Another year at Lumon has come to a close, leaving us with more Severance answers and yet somehow more Severance questions than ever before too. The Eagan family experienced some major losses, but things weren’t all sunshine and roses for Mark, Helly, Dylan, and Irving either.
“You and your family created hell and you’re going to burn in it,” an enraged Helly R. tells Jame Eagan in the beginning of the Severance Season 2 finale. But will they? Watch the video and let’s dig in!

Be warned, of course: Full spoilers follow for Severance Season 2.
We learn a lot about what’s going on at Lumon before the credits roll on Season 2. We’ve spent almost four years wondering what the Macro Data Refinement (MDR) team was doing on the severed floor, and it turns out that every time Mark (Adam Scott) and his team complete a new file, they create a new consciousness for Mark's wife, Gemma (Dichen Lachman).
Meanwhile, Helly (Britt Lower) - or is it Helena? - remains a big mystery. Dylan G. (Zach Che
title: Severance Season 2 Ending Explained: How Does It Set Up Season 3?

author: IGN
description:
MLB The Show 25 reviewed by Justin Koreis on PlayStation 5, also available on Xbox Series X|S and Switch.

MLB The Show remains one of the best sports series around. The new upgrade system and the amateur portion of your player’s journey have reinvigorated Road To The Show, while the shift away from Sets and Seasons has righted Diamond Dynasty’s biggest wrong. While it’s a bit of a bummer that the Storylines feature isn’t living up to its full potential, it remains a worthwhile and important inclusion that has reach beyond the game of baseball. All the small touches like updated infielder reactions and new quick time events have the on-field action in a great place, too. It’s not always easy for an annual franchise to justify the move to a new entry, but in the case of MLB The Show 25, it does more than enough to make me glad it has arrived.
title: MLB The Show 25 Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era, a new installment in the turn-based strategy game series. Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is coming soon to Early Access on Steam.

Olden Era returns to the world of Enroth and the origins of the legendary saga, inviting both veterans and new players to go on a new strategic quest on Jadame, a mysterious continent in turmoil, mentioned but never explored in the previous games, with its unique factions, biomes and creatures. 

Play solo with a new campaign, explore single and limitless randomly generated maps, or engage in battle of wits and magic with other players in multiplayer mode. Or even build your own Heroes of Might & Magic stories with the in-game map and campaign editor.
title: Heroes of Might And Magic: Olden Era - Official New Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft may have accidentally leaked a mockup of how the Steam UI would look on Xbox. Via the Verge, the image was taken down soon after, but this adds more speculation to Microsoft's future Xbox plans and possible integration with Steam, Epic Games Store, and more. Xbox head Phil Spencer has already voiced support for letting gamers play their Steam library on Xbox consoles. In other news, Assassin's Creed Shadows is topping the charts after just one day since being released. According to Ubisoft, the game has seen 1 million players across all available platforms. Of course, sales data is not yet available, but the game is also riding high off strong critic and user reviews. And finally, co-op hit Split Fiction's success is catching the eye of Hollywood, and now a package is being put together to shop an adaptation to the big studios.
title: Microsoft Leaks Xbox UI Mockup for Steam Tab - IGN Daily Fix

description:

author: IGN
description:
Join co-founder & creative director Joseph Rogers at developer Silent Games for a deep dive into the story, character creation, gameplay, and cartograms from the upcoming action RPG, Empyreal. In a far-flung corner of the galaxy an Expedition arrives on a hitherto unexplored planet to find a colossal Monolith built by a lost civilization. These are no mere ruins: the Monolith is filled with danger, and the Expedition is ill-equipped to unearth the secrets within. 

Empyreal will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on May 8, 2025. The
title: Empyreal - Official Game Overview Trailer

description:

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for the omnibus film, Kaiju No. 8: Mission Recon! Crunchyroll and Sony Pictures Entertainment to release the omnibus film in North American theatres on Friday, April 11, 12 and 13.

 In a Kaiju-filled Japan, Kafka Hibino works in monster disposal. After reuniting with his childhood friend Mina Ashiro, a rising star in the anti-Kaiju Defense Force, he decides to pursue his abandoned dream of joining the Force... when he suddenly transforms into the powerful "Kaiju No. 8." With help from his junior colleague Reno Ichikawa, Kafka hides his identity while striving towards his life-long dream of passing the Defense Force exam and standing at Mina's side. But when a mysterious intelligent Kaiju attacks a Defense Force base, Kafka faces a crucial decision in a desperate situation... 

The omnibus film  Kaiju No. 8: Mission Recon features an action-packed recap of season one and a new original episode, Hoshina’s Day Off.

(Hoshina's Day Off) A day off... a rare day of p
title: Kaiju No.8: Misson Recon - Official Teaser Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the Frosthaven reveal trailer for the upcoming video game adaptation of the board game. The trailer shows characters and more from this evolution of the Frosthaven board game, and this dark fantasy tactical RPG serves as a spiritual successor to Gloomhaven and is developed by Snapshot Games. Frosthaven will be coming to Steam Early Access in 2025.
title: Frosthaven - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch as chaos unfolds in this exclusive clip from Marshmallow, an upcoming horror film from director Daniel Del Purgatorio. Marshmallow stars Giorgia Whigham, Alysia Reiner, and Corbin Bernsen.

At a secluded summer camp, Morgan, a shy and introverted 12-year-old, is thrust into a living nightmare when a legendary campfire tale becomes real. As a mysterious figure begins stalking the camp, Morgan and his newfound friends must embark on a perilous journey- one that will force them to confront their deepest fears and question the very nature of their existence.
title: Marshmallow - Exclusive Clip (2025) Giorgia Whigham, Alysia Reiner, Corbin Bernsen

author: IGN
description: Get a deep dive into the combat of Cloudheim in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure RPG. The new trailer shows strategies to take on various enemies, combo-driven combat, and the four playstyles you can choose from based on the weapons you equip. Cloudheim will be available on Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PC (via Epic Games Store and Steam) in 2025.
title: Cloudheim - Official Combat Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Overwatch 2 Freja takes the spotlight in this latest Overwatch 2 gameplay trailer. Check out the Overwatch 2 trailer to see the new Damage Hero, Freja, in action. Once Overwatch's most renowned search-and-rescue operative, Freja now hunts bounties with unmatched skill and explosive precision.

Armed with her signature Revdraw Crossbow and a highly mobile kit, Freja is a tactical nightmare for her opponents as she excels in both long-range and mid-air combat.

Freja is available to try during her limited-time trial today through March 24, 2025. Freja officially arrives in Season 16 of Overwatch 2 on April 22, 2025.

#Overwatch2 #Gaming #Games
title: Overwatch 2 - Official Freja Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:

Uniquely colored Shiny Pokémon are debuting alongside Pokémon originally discovered in the Paldea region. Shining Revelry features over 110 cards including Pokémon ex, new Trainers, and an immersive card. The Shining Revelry expansion for Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket will be available on March 26, 2025 (10:00 p.m. PDT).

#Pokemon #Gaming #Games
title: Pokemon TCG Pocket: Shining Revelry - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss this Atomfall gameplay, running on an RTX 5090 at max settings (4K 60FPS)! This Atomfall opening gameplay showcases the first moments from Rebellion's 2025 action survival game!

A mix of Fallout, Far Cry, and STALKER, in this Atomfall gameplay - played with an NVIDIA RTX 5090 GPU on Ultra Graphics Detail, 140% Render Scale - we escape from a vault, take on a bandit camp, and more, all while enjoying the Northern England landscape!

Interested in playing this yourself? The Atomfall release date is March 27, 2025, for PC, Xbox, and PlayStation for the Standard Edition, with three days Early Access available for those with the Deluxe Edition.

#Atomfall #IGN #Gaming
title: Atomfall Gameplay: The First 17 Minutes (RTX 5090, 4K 60FPS)

author: IGN
description:
Here are 10 things Assassin's Creed Shadows doesn't tell you! Every Assassin's Creed game introduces new features and little details, and AC Shadows is no exception. With two playable protagonists, there are tons of important mechanics that you don't want to miss -- especially if the game doesn't explicitly tell you. Don't worry, we've got 10 big ones right here.

0:00 - Intro
0:25 - AC Shadows Switching Characters
0:54 - Observing Everything 
1:40 - Knocking Out Enemies 
2:18 - Deflecting Combos
2:53 - Meditating for More Story
3:24 - Increasing AC Shadows Knowledge
4:06 - Clearing Castles 
4:39 - Changing AC Shadows Seasons
5:22 - Getting Free XP & Buffs
5:57 - Painting AC Shadows Animals

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows
title: 10 Things Assassin's Creed Shadows Doesn't Tell You

author: IGN
description:
Atomfall reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PC. Also available on PlayStation and Xbox.

"Atomfall is a gripping survival-action adventure that takes some of the best elements of Fallout and Elden Ring, and synthesises them into its own fresh mutation. It presents a picturesque chunk of English countryside littered with alluring structures to pique and reward your curiosity, eccentric locals to meet, and absorbing mysteries to unravel, and uses classic iconography from British sci-fi and horror to consistently unsettling effect. In spite of some enemy behaviours that are occasionally less stable than a reactor in meltdown, Atomfall is a compelling, post-apocalyptic survival story that satisfyingly bends to your choices and discoveries no matter which direction you take."
title: Atomfall Review

author: IGN
description:
This week, Michael and Ryan discuss their exicitement for the rumored remake of The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion and how close to release it apparently is (hint: it's really close!). 
This week’s show is Ryan McCaffrey, Michael Higham, and was produced by Nick Maillet

Unlocked is a part of Geek Media Podcast Network, an IGN Entertainment Brand.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Is Still Worth Playing After 19 Years - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Kaiserpunk reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

While it has some cool ideas, a unique aesthetic, and often rewarding production chain management, Kaiserpunk definitely is not ready for the front lines in its current state. There are huge, save-killing bugs. The interface lacks what I would consider to be some fairly basic functionality. And the often strong city-building layer doesn't harmonize well at all with the over-scoped and cumbersome strategic map. Maybe some substantial patches could theoretically let me recommend Kaiserpunk on its strengths as a city builder with a novel premise. But for now, I can't even really do that. The trenches may have vanished under the plow, but playing Kaiserpunk still leaves me feeling shell-shocked.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kaiserpunk Review

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week, Game Scoop's Sam Claiborn joins to to peer into the future with our predictions for the Nintendo Switch 2. The big reveal for Nintendo's new hybrid console is coming up on April 2nd, and we give our best guesses on price, release date, games at launch, and more. Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Our Final Nintendo Switch 2 Predictions - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
With the recent release of the new co-op game Split Fiction, IGN decided to revisit our Top 10 best co-op games.

Just a heads up, we have a few caveats as we define what “co-op” means for this list. We wanted to focus on coop games that were truly built around that cooperative experience. This is a list of the top 10 cooperative games, not the 10 best games that happen to be playable cooperatively, which is why you’ll see a lot of games that can only be played with two players. 

Also, to keep this from stepping on the toes of other genres, we’re omitting MMOs, MOBAs, and any games that are solely focused on competitive cooperative play. We want to highlight the games that bring people together to work towards a common goal that’s not simply “beat the other team.”
This is an update to our list from 2021. While games like Monster Hunter: World, Overcooked 2, Left 4 Dead 2, Rockband 4, It Takes Two, and Sea of Thieves (to name a few) managed to keep a spot on the list, it has been upd
title: The 10 Best Co-Op Games

author: IGN
description:
Here's your first look at some Will: Follow The Light gameplay in the latest trailer for the upcoming narrative first-person adventure puzzle game from indie developer TomorrowHead Studio.

Get a look at some of Will: Follow The Light's puzzles, environments and characters from Will’s ruined hometown. This gameplay also showcases the game’s simulated yacht controls and open seas.

Will: Follow The Light will be released in 2025 on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S. This trailer featured in the Future Games Show Spring Showcase.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Will: Follow The Light - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Deathground is a solo and co-op, survival horror game that throws players into a desperate battle for survival against deadly AI dinosaurs. The game features dynamic gameplay enriched with mission objectives, stealth and combat; unpredictable AI dinosaurs; a range of items and weapons; and truly terrifying environments, harnessing the power of Unreal Engine 5.
Head over to Steam and add Deathground to your wishlist now!
